value:
I once betrayed Prince Marth, if
only because Est was a hostage.
I will never atone for that crime.

I own a small shop in Altea. If you
ever have need of goods, you have
but to ask.

Here, take this torch with you for
patrols. It should make it a little
easier to find your way in the dark.

I'm curious about the shops in
town. Would you join me to visit
them sometime?

My Est prepares the most
wonderful dishes. If only you
could try them!

You're $Nu, yes?$k$pI've been sent to deliver greetings
from $Nf!

For my homeland and for my
beloved.

I'm pleased that I haven't gotten
too rusty.
Drat. I've neglected my training...

Thank you. I will always be a
proud knight of Altea.

I am Abel, a knight of Altea—or
former knight, anyway. These
days, I am but a shopkeeper.

Prince Marth and my beloved Est
are both so important to me.$k$pMy loyalty toward my liege,
my affection toward my beloved...
Both feelings are clear and strong.$k$pBut are my feelings toward you
loyalty because you summoned me?
Or genuine, growing friendship?$k$pI cannot say. The only thing that is
clear...is that now I have someone
else who is important to me.$k$pI hope you will continue to count
on me as you always have.
はっ！
せいっ！
うああっ！
You're...strong...
Make your peace.
Back with you!
No mercy!
You've underestimated me.
Apologies...
Haha
What's wrong?
I fear that I've grown soft since leaving the knights.
I run a small shop. Perhaps you can visit someday.
Let me know if you need anything—anything at all.
I was once known as...Abel the Panther.
When there are two precious things in your life, you must choose between them.
I swear on my life never to betray you.
Of course.
Advance?
Yes.
